A Glimpse of Dostoevsky

A humble home, five children crowded.  
Their parents read aloud, instilling values.  
Child: “What’s this story about?”  
Parent: “Bravery, my dear. Listen closely.”  

---

A school, young Dostoevsky stands proud.  
Thought: “Third place! I can achieve greatness!”  
Friends: “You’ll be a famous writer!”  
Dostoevsky: “I hope so!”  

---

A dark cell, shadows loom.  
Dostoevsky: “What have I done?”  
Guard: “You spoke against the state.”  
Dostoevsky: “I sought truth, not rebellion.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dostoevsky, despite his promising beginnings and literary acclaim, faced arrest and condemnation due to his involvement in discussions against censorship.
